name: Bomba Contro Bomba
overview: Bomba Contro Bomba is an unauthorized re-release in Italy of a game called Chain Reaction! from Compute magazine. The objective is to eliminate all of your opponent's bombs from the 5x6 grid. Players alternate placing one bomb each turn. If a placed bomb has enough bombs adjacent to it, it will explode and this can cause a chain reaction, taking out other bombs that are surrounded in turn.
